articles.description: The partnership of Chris Martin’s band with biofuel producer Neste has raised eyebrows about the green credentials of their new tour says culture writer Eleanor Salter
articles.content:
OpinionThe partnership of Chris Martins band with biofuel producer Neste has raised eyebrows about the green credentials of their new tour
Wed 11 May 2022 11.00 EDT
